title: Courgette pasta in cream cheese sauce
ingredients: ['340g uncooked pasta', '3 tablespoons vegetable oil', '2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '450g courgettes, grated', '125ml milk', '115g cream cheese, cubed', '25g chopped fresh basil', 'salt and pepper to taste', '4 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese']
